body_html:
While we can skip tests/update testdata, this does mean that the serialized tensors will only be usable on the architecture that created it, which is a sad situation to be in.

@namrata-ibm : Would you have the bandwidth to contribute a more principled fix where we could record the endinaness of the creator in the checkpoint and do the conversion if necessary when we load the checkpoint?

body:
While we can skip tests/update testdata, this does mean that the serialized tensors will only be usable on the architecture that created it, which is a sad situation to be in.

@namrata-ibm : Would you have the bandwidth to contribute a more principled fix where we could record the endinaness of the creator in the checkpoint and do the conversion if necessary when we load the checkpoint?
